allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
feat: Improve workflow automation and filtering

- Update branch-to-in-progress workflow to support all branch patterns (not just feature/**)
- Add first-push detection to prevent duplicate Slack notifications
- Filter daily report to include only developers (exclude planners)
- Fix developer GitHub usernames (jaemoon23 instead of JaeMoonL)

ğŸ¤– Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.com/claude-code)

Co-Authored-By: Claude <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
)")

Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
fix: GitHub Actions workflow syntax error

- Fix ''branches'' and ''branches-ignore'' conflict
- Use negation pattern (!main, !master, !develop) instead
- Workflow now triggers on all branches except main/master/develop

ğŸ¤– Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.com/claude-code)

Co-Authored-By: Claude <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
)")

Bash("C:\Program Files (x86)\GitHub CLI\gh.exe" issue list --limit 50 --state all)
Bash("C:\Program Files (x86)\GitHub CLI\gh.exe" pr list --limit 20 --state all)
